column2: ENGLISH
You have agreed to hold elections to potentially determine the next [Root.GetTitle] of the [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName].

Elections are being held in the [From.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName], and you are considered to be [From.GetTitle] [From.GetFullName]'s chief challenger. The electoral council is expected to deliver its verdicts in a few days time.

Elections are being held in the [From.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName], and you are considered to be [From.GetTitle] [From.GetFullName]'s chief challenger. It will take a few days for the popular vote to be fully tallied.
The electoral council has completed their deliberations and announced the winner of the ongoing election.
You won!
[FromFrom.GetTitle] [FromFrom.GetFullName] was re-elected.
The full vote has been tallied, and the electoral commission has announced the outcome of the election.
You won!
[FromFrom.GetTitle] [FromFrom.GetFullName] was re-elected.
You lost a federal election to [From.GetTitle] [From.GetFullName].
You were re-elected in your race against [From.GetTitle] [From.GetFullName].
[From.GetTitle] [From.GetFullName] has won an election and is now your superior.
[From.GetTitle] [From.GetFullName] has been re-elected.
An election has been called, and you are entitled to vote in the race between challenger [From.GetFullName] and incumbent [From.GetTitle] [FromFrom.GetFullName].
Vote for [From.GetFullName]
Vote for [From.GetTitle] [FromFrom.GetFullName]
Your current term as [Root.GetTitle] of the [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName] has expired. The constitution demands that elections be held immediately.
Hold Election
Refuse to Hold Election
